_meanings:
{@--4@} To entrust, 
consign, commit to the care of, deliver;
{#ahamapi tava sUnO nyastarAjyaH#} <ls>V. 5. 17</ls>,
{#BrAtari nyasya mAM#} <ls>Bk. 5. 82.</ls>

{@--6@} To state,
bring forward, adduce, propound (as 

an argument); {#arTAMtaraM nyasyati#} <ls>Malli.</ls>
on <ls>Śi. 1. 17.</ls>
